content: Just my opinion, but it looks like Alabama won’t be playing anybody all year. We’ll at least anybody who can establish a run game, or anybody who can last four quarters of physical football. The only team that can beat Alabama, and this statement has proven true for three years now, is Alabama. It’s going to take a mistake free performance against a mistake plagued Alabama team. I would like to see Washington win it all because I’m a fan of the underdog, even as an Alabama fan. I just don’t see them holding up. Ohio State doesn’t impress me at all, and Clemson isn’t the team they were last year. Nevertheless let the games begin.
